video_title: Will you put it into practice? #motivation #mindset #personalgrowth
transcript:
lot of people ask how do I get confident
right how do I build confidence in
myself and they think I have to go do
something and I have to succeed that's
not necessarily the truth sometimes I
think a lot of our confidence comes from
feeling fear doing it anyways maybe not
having the results that we actually
wanted to but in turn looked at it and
said I'm really proud that I showed up
for myself yes and that builds
confidence in you huge time when you
show up for you that's big the fear
failure is really thinking about my
future self and saying would my future
self be proud that I didn't take the
shot or more proud that I actually did
take the shot I failed I learned
something from it and it led to
something even better after that failure
or that loss
